Class Text

java.lang.Object
Text
public class Text extends Object
A class that uses methods for "pattern matching" via suffix arrays and/or streams.

    • getStrFre

      public static long getStrFre(String str, String search)
      If it exists, it returns the frequency of a string in a text.
      Parameters:
      str - text on which to build the suffix array and where the search will be done.string to search for.
      search - string to search for.
      Returns:
      returns the frequency of the string.

    • getLCS

      public static List<String> getLCS(int k, String... strings)
      Constructs a list containing the longest common substrings among k strings.
      Parameters:
      k - the number of strings we want to find LCS for.
      strings - Strings on which to build the suffix array.
      Returns:
      The list with the LCS ( if exist).
